title: DYNAMIC  LINK LIBARY
body:
HEY 
WHEN I OPEN THE LEAGUE CLIENT  IT GIVE ME (ENTRY POINT NOT FOUND):THE PROCEDURE ENTRY POINT CRYPTO_MEMCMP COULD NOT BE LOCATED THE DYNAMIC LINK LIBEAY.32.DLL. 
CAN YOU GIVE ME THE SOLUTION FOR THIS PROBLEM?

replies.body: This seems to be a Windows based error, so something with your OS could be corrupt or missing.  I suggest running a [System File Checker](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/929833/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files) to scan and diagnose the situation.  Hopefully, it's able to pick and repair the issue!
